name: Nexa Resources S.A.
description: Nexa Resources S.A. is a leading mining company that specializes in the production of zinc and copper. Headquartered in Luxembourg, the company operates mining and metallurgical facilities primarily in Brazil and Peru. Nexa was formed in 2017 through the combination of the Brazilian mining company Votorantim Metais and the Canadian company Nexa Resources, which allowed it to leverage a strong portfolio of assets and capabilities. The company is committed to sustainable mining practices and aims to create value not only for its shareholders but also for the communities in which it operates. Nexa's operations include the mining of zinc and copper, as well as the recycling of metals, which supports its commitment to environmental responsibility. The company also invests in innovative technologies to reduce environmental impact and improve efficiency across its operations. With a focus on sustainability, Nexa aims to contribute positively to the global transition towards a low-carbon economy.
